Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO INTERNET AND TECHNOLOGY

Title: Prohibits online retailers from basing prices on certain criteria
Summary: Prohibits online retailers from basing prices on the hardware, software, or geolocation of an online device.
LawCode: Add ยง219, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting online retailers from basing prices on certain criteria
